description: The autotailor stage produces a tailoring file that the OpenSCAP scanner can use to scan
and remediate a system. The autotailor rules override a base profile either enabling or
disabling (selecting or unselecting) a given rule for the profile. The autotailor command
generates and xml diff between the user provided overrides and the base profile.

filepath.description: Filename and path to where the tailoring file will be saved

datastream.description: The path to the datastream file

new_profile.description: The name of the new customized OpenSCAP profile

selected.description: The rules to select in addition to the base OpenSCAP profile

unselected.description: The rules to deselect from the base OpenSCAP profile

overrides.description: The variables to override in the base OpenSCAP profile
